author: Kwame Onwuachi
title: Kwame's Pepper Shrimp
ingredients: 1 fresh Scotch bonnet chile, stemmed, unseeded, and minced (about 1 tablespoon)
3 pounds unpeeled head-on raw large shrimp, deveined
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium. Add garlic, chile, and ginger; cook, stirring often, until aromatic and tender, about 5 minutes. Add lime juice, vinegar, and thyme; bring to a simmer over medium. Increase heat to medium-high; add shrimp, and cook, stirring often, until shrimp are opaque and cooked through, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Sprinkle with salt, and serve immediately.
